item.title: [PI] Weird shop error
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“noobcoderh2o, post:1, topic:376382”]pi source
317

Ok i was adding items to my pk point shops.

i compiled it and it was fine and then i ran my server and got this

after aadding the items to pk points i went to shop assistance. and added

//starter //case 8850: // return 30; //case 7462: // return 25; // case 4151: // return 20; // case 14494: // return 60; //case 15039: // return 150; // case 11335: // return 100; // case 6585: // return 35;

dont worry i didnt have the // so i added that and this

8850	10	7462	100	4151	25	14484	5	11335	15	6585	10

then i ran it and got that error. wdf. and the only way i fixed was i went to shops at put // before the pk point shops

re-tested it and i used tab still not working[/quote]It has to be that you need a break after them. here just remove this 6585 10 and see what u get

Read full topic
